name: UpFacts
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: up facts
des: If you are a fan of Pixar's animated film 'Up', this app is certainly for you. Just say 'Alexa, open Up facts' and get to know some unknown facts about your favorite film!!! Each time you say this words, you will be presented with a fact. So what are you waiting for?
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
